author: ehillenius
msg: added metadata facility to Application. This is a really nice way to store generic, application level (meta) data - like non-component specific authorization data - while not having to resort to using statics.

author: ehillenius
msg: finished roles authorization based on Wicket meta data

author: jdonnerstag
msg: removed top level from exception stack for mock applications

author: jdonnerstag
msg: Though I don't think it every worked for WebComponents in the past. It does for Containers.
Note: If Applet were a Container you could simply derive it from OpenWebMarkupContainer which opens up the tag for you. But it now works for Components as well.

author: ehillenius
msg: you can now either use a single or a multiple action annotation
